text: Kundayam is a village in Kollam district, Kerala state, India. It is located near Pathanapuram. == Politics == Kundayam is a part of Pathanapuram assembly constituency in Mavelikkara (Lok Sabha constituency). Shri. K. B. Ganesh Kumar is the current MLA of Pathanpuram. Shri. Kodikkunnil Suresh is the current member of parliament of Mavelikkara. == References == Category:Villages in Kollam district
title: Kundayam
